ComicInfo.Summary:
Last Laugh of a Corpse: When George Hoskins died he left a fortune to whichever of his nieces and nephews could find it, knowing they would kill each other in greed.
A Pound of Flesh... and Blood: Mr. Grigg tries to put Mildred's cat to sleep.
My Ghost Writer the Vampire: In exchange for a safe place to sleep during the day a vampire offers horror writer Prentice Vaughn true tales for his novels.
ComicInfo.Writer: Carl Wessler,George Kashdan,Murray Boltinoff,Scott Edelman,Carl Wessler,George Kashdan,Scott Edelman
ComicInfo.Title: Last Laugh of a Corpse; A Pound of Flesh... and Blood; My Ghost Writer the Vampire
